text.en: Activity types and channel types are now in title case. Example: PLAYING is now Playing, GUILD_TEXT is now GuildText. In raw states all type field values are now numbers representing the internal enum values of the types. Please make sure to check and update your usages of the types after upgrading to version 2.0.0 or newer.

In Rohzust√§nden sind nun alle type-Werte Zahlen, die den internen Enum-Werten der Typen entsprechen. Bitte darauf achten, die Verwenung von Typ-Werten nach dem Upgrade auf Version 2.0.0 oder neuer zu √ºberpr√ºfen und ggf. zu aktualisieren.

Certifique-se de verificar e atualizar seus usos dos tipos ap√≥s atualizar para a vers√£o 2.0.0 ou mais recente.

Controleer alsjeblieft en update je gebruik van de types na het upgraden naar versie 2.0 of nieuwer.

In stati grezzi tutti i valori di campo di tipo sono ora numeri che rappresentano i valori enum interni dei tipi.
